text: Hello. I'm new in HubSpot. I cannot see for now if we can use modules for many sites. Saying we have a website A, B, and C. And a module Y. Can we use the Y module on websites A, B, C, or should we duplicate the Y module on each website? The question can be summarized as this: when we create several websites, are they all under the same HubSpot account (the service provider's one), or are there multiple accounts (in this case, a module can be shared by several accounts?)? Is there any link to documentation about this?

If all sites are on one portal, modules added to that portal can be used on all of those sites.

If the sites are separate portals modules can be copied from site to site if a user has access to both sites. 

There is one situation where this may not be true and thats with paid marketplace modules and templates.
Is there a way to know where a module is used in a portal?
in the design manager you should be able to right click and show its dependents
